text: A very professional and friendly 中医师. I have right wrist injury which causing my shoulder pain when pulling my hand to my lower back. This due to bad blood circulation. After some adjustments and cupping, i feel lesser pain and much more better then before. Thanks to Dr. Samuel 👍🙏

I had a sprain ankle and went to a couple of TCM to try and fox. All didn’t work until I met Samuel. He fixed my ankle and now able to resume my normal activities. Will definitely recommend him and I must say his advise is super helpful!

I'm so lucky to get a very last minute slot. Sprained my wrist and the pain is really unbearable and Samuel really went out of his way to slot me in even though is pass their closing time. Within 30 mins my hand felt so much better and he is so nice to explain every step and procedure to assure me. Really worth a visit and the price is so affordable!

Had a very bad sprain on my ankle, barely was able to stand or put pressure on my feet. After visiting Dr Samuel and undergoing a painful treatment, the pain scale went from a 10/10 to a 4/10.

2 days later and i am able to walk and almost no pain left. Highly recommend 👌👌

Healed my one-year long ankle sprain. I have been to several physicians but Dr Samuel's treatment is on point, effective and he takes the time to explain my condition and what he is doing. Pls come to him if you are in pain! Indeed 名不虚传。Thank you also to the friendly and caring lady assistant who adds to the whole very pleasant experience.
